name: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
notes:
In order to download the version of Dark Souls 2 with Japanese language support, one has to purchase the game while on a Japanese IP address. There is actually a different page presented for this version for a different steamid, note that there is a line on the store page stating that this is the version with Japanese support (お知らせ: このバージョンのゲームは日本語を含みます。); even though there is still no support stated in the usual place for language support.

The grass and other types of foliage seem to only appear when you are standing in them but everything else renders right.
content:
game:
  appid: 236430
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    key: StrictDrawOrdering
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    type: REG_SZ
    value: enabled
